DESCRIPTION:
How to Survive - zombie survival shooter, which is set on a remote archipelago off the coast of Colombia. Together with other survivors you have to deal with the search for food, water and shelter, as well as crafting a variety of gadgets and weapons. Players can be combined with others in local or online multiplayer to progress through the story, or test, where you must stand against the growing crowds infected.

Features:
- Three characters with unique characteristics
- Island with terrible monsters
- Collect "Survival Guide"
- Play with your friends in offline or online
- The complexity of the "Iron Man"
